trans-unit.source: A collection that stores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> objects.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the rows in an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> classe rappresenta la raccolta di tutti gli stili consentono di descrivere le righe in un oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />.
Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.Add%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.Add%2A> metodo consente di riapplicare il layout della tabella a tutti i controlli corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> contenitore.

trans-unit.source: The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
trans-unit.target: Il numero degli stili archiviati in una raccolta è limitato solo dalla memoria disponibile.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />.
Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" /> contains a specific style.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />.
Determines the index of a specific item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />.
The index of <paramref name="rowStyle" /> if found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />; otherwise, -1.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> method begins searching at the first element of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> and ends either when it finds a match or it reaches the last element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> metodo inizia la ricerca del primo elemento del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> e termina quando viene trovata una corrispondenza o raggiunge l'ultimo elemento.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> should be inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />.
The value can be <see langword="null" />.
Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" /> at the specified position.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.Insert%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.Insert%2A> metodo consente di riapplicare il layout della tabella a tutti i controlli corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> contenitore.

trans-unit.source: The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
trans-unit.target: Il numero degli stili archiviati in una raccolta è limitato solo dalla memoria disponibile.

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the inserted element.
trans-unit.target: In raccolte di elementi adiacenti, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> (classe), gli elementi successivi al punto di inserimento spostati verso il basso per consentire l'inserimento dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiornati anche gli indici degli elementi spostati.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> to get or set.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> at the specified index.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />.
The value can be <see langword="null" />.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.Remove%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.Remove%2A> metodo consente di riapplicare il layout della tabella a tutti i controlli corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> contenitore.

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the deletion point move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: In raccolte di elementi adiacenti, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> (classe), gli elementi successivi al punto di eliminazione spostano su per occupare la posizione rimasta vuota.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiornati anche gli indici degli elementi spostati.
